website_summaries.verdict: Top choice to sanitize all of the smart devices in your home.
pros: One of the few models tested in a scientific lab
Proven to remove 99.99% of germs on your phone
Charges your phone and a smaller secondary device while sanitizing
Works on any phone, including larger ones
Earns bonus points for also zapping germs out of small objects like pacifiers
cons: Some think the device is too large

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this. Very poor instructions. Do I leave it plugged in all the time? Which USB outlet to use? But the biggest problem is that the light on the top never stays on for more than 5 seconds. I called the #, but no one picks up. One of my questions was answered after ab e-mail, but nothing about that light. Will have to return it. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Teri D. Winton

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. BROKE AFTER 4 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!! Worked fine, until the fourth month where the unit stopped responding to the touch button. The unit turns on and off on its own regardless of whether I press the button or not. The light indicator also stopped turning on even when it turns on, on its own. I have never even moved the unit since I got it so the unit just broke on its own after 4 months of limited use.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: It broke after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 28 days. I can't recommend anything that breaks this easily. The largest item I put in it was my pixel 3xl. Can't recommend this. The company warranty says they will repair with new or used parts. I am just going to return it through Amazon. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: A Blessing To Have During the COVID-19 Crisis
customer_reviews.text: Although it took a month to fulfill my order AND the packaging had been opened and apparently used, I love the PhoneSoap3 Pro. It didn't look damage in any way so I wasn't about to return it seeing we are in the COVID-19 Crisis and how long it took to get it in the first place. I love the ease of operation and the comfort it give me as I use it on all the things around the house (i.e.. Phone, Keys, rings, remotes, all the things we use but seldom think about cleaning.) The PhoneSoap3 Pro is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: just Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We love how quickly the SoapPhone sanitizers our phones! We also use it for other small items that will fit in it such as credit cards, keys, etc. This one was purchased for our son who lives elsewhere but we also have one and all of us were very impressed with it. First heard about this product from our sister in early February when she showed us hers while we were on vacation with her. She had purchased one a few months ago and highly recommended it to us. Since that time I had seen this product recommended in several articles and on TV.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but does it actually clean??
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up. Use it without otter box and with to get a full cleaning. Not sure if it actually works as myself, and others reviewing it, never actually swabbed their phones and then ran samples in in a incubator. Good way to sell something during this crisis. Basically a bought peace of mind of cleaning until it's actually proven.
customer_reviews.author: T_Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Essential Daily Use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this way before the current Corona virus hit and use it every day for phones and keys. We would get a bigger one next time, as this is pretty small, can only fit one thing at a time, so it takes a while to do phones, cc, earphones, keys, etc. Also price was quite high compared to some other options, so would recommend finding a more affordable brand, but very helpful for decontamination.
customer_reviews.author: Lila G

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. The Pro is a good size and easy to use. Very pleased (so far).
customer_reviews.author: John Rossi

customer_reviews.title: It makes me feel like I am doing something proactive to protecting our health.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for all 3 of our cell phones in use in our home. It makes me feel safer, although I have no way of testing it to see if it really does anything. It is hard for me to get it open...it needs a handle. Senior citizens with arthritic hands will find it difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: shelly nichols

customer_reviews.title: ON indicator failed in less than 60 days.
customer_reviews.text: The indicator on top of the device stopped working in about two months. Just as the return window expired. The unit appears to be function as light can be see thru the cable opening. A disappointing purchase give the big names attached.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Western Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy I was able to get this. In times like these it is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: csquare6

customer_reviews.title: Manual or Auto ?
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a neat device, but unable to figure out if the cleaning is done. I see a red lightning bolt after a few minutes - assume its an error Not able to discern if it is due to manual ?
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. Stopped functioning properly after 3 weeks. Won’t turn off. Supposedly has a function of choice of mode. This breaks quickly. Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: BSD

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizes more than iPhones 📱
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fast (5minutes). Use it for iPhones, electric tooth brush heads, keys, watches. Pretty much everything that goes in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Sanatizing Wiz!
customer_reviews.text: The PhoneSoap 3 UV Smartphone Sanitizer is easy to use and we can tell the difference of "Cleanness" of of cell phone,cases and key fabs after using the device. The Phone soap 3 is bigger than must photos represent and is helpful with our bigger devices.
customer_reviews.author: SaratogaJake

customer_reviews.title: Love the look & Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Easy to use. Have used it for other items like my EarPods and watch also. Came packaged very well and nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Diappointed company and keep my money for three months without delivery.
customer_reviews.text: no parameter to tell whether it works or not. high price is the fact. Also purchased HOME SOAP, which unfortunately delayed the delivery although it claimed "secure your order". Paid 3 months and only received notice that the delivery date cannot be ascertain and will be delayed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 3 months. A short in the wire so it doesn't go on and one of the blue lights inside doesn't light up. I contacted the supply or just to exchange it but I never heard from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Wit

customer_reviews.title: Added safety!
customer_reviews.text: We like having this important new layer of protection while using our cell phones and other frequently handled objects like keys, writing pens, reading glasses, credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: great cleansing for the smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: its like taking ur smartphone on a bubblebath vacay! only cleaner and more hygiene - thanks phonesoap!
customer_reviews.author: ktbffh16

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The disinfecting bulbs inside started to crack!! I’ve been on hold for over 15 minutes to speak with CS...so disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Cool teabag

customer_reviews.title: Is it making a difference?  I will never know.
customer_reviews.text: This is a weird product because it's hard to tell if it's actually making a difference. If it is, this thing is 10/10. If it's not, it's a 0/10 scam. I have no idea. But assuming it's not a scam, I'll give it 5 stars. It's easy, and you phone gets to experience what a tanning bed is like.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Seidner

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had in 6 months and it’s just completely stopped working. We loved it till now but 6 months is ridiculous on a purchase such as this. Super bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy and quick to use and I feel good that my phone is completely clean
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: a red light has started to come on after charging; looks like a bulb on top is cracked;
customer_reviews.text: How to I get my money back or a return for new one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie/South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love. We also use it for game consoles, keys and other items around the house and small toys.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Edelbrock

customer_reviews.title: Phone Soap is a quick method to sanitize your phone
customer_reviews.text: An easy way to remove any viruses with 5 minutes of cleaning with the UV light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not what you might hope it would be and hope it would do
customer_reviews.text: They should tell you that it only cleans the SURFACE of what you put into it. If you put a few dollar bills it will only clean the surfaces that are exposed. It will not clean beyond that. So you basically have to put one bill in at a time every 5 minutes or so. I’ve encouraged them to let people know this fact, and they said they would, but after several months they still aren’t. They are trying to take advantage of the pandemic. Shame on them.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: It gives peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: My whole family uses PhoneSoap. We even put our toothbrush heads in it for cleaning. During these crises times, it gives us much satisfaction. One reviewer stated that it did not turn off after using it for the 5 minute time frame. There is a manual on/off place on top of the device. Otherwise, just unplug it when not in use. This a very good value. One remembers the quality long after one forgets the price.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, great protective throw away packaging
customer_reviews.text: High quality product first impression. nice features, maybe a bit smaller than advertising suggests. Packaging is excellent except it is completely environmentally unfriendly. Would not recommend purchase if you care about the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: You have to trust that it’s doing it’s thing. The light goes on so I assume it’s working. Construction seems to be top notch. It’s easy to use. 5 min timer for each item. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: B. Wong

customer_reviews.title: PhoneSoap Pro
customer_reviews.text: I work at a pharmacy and I wanted something to sterilize my phone, watch, pen, and keys when I get home. I use it to sterilize my Apple TV remotes too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: seems to work well - great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I use it to sanitize my phone, keys, credit cards, headphones - anything that will fit. However, the USB charger, which is an "extra" feature did not work - it would not charge my device. I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely overrated and overpriced product whose effectiveness we can't even really see or feel anyway. There are many knockoffs on the market that are 1/6 of their price and all you have to do is look for the wavelength they use and make sure it's enough (as well as the according time). Just do your research and you'll know. I found this somewhat disappointing because it doesn't hold my wallet phonecase, all my keys at once, ... which the cheaper version I bought does. So, I didn't see the point of spending that much money. Plus, it's way too big (and still doesn't hold more).
customer_reviews.author: RxBxCCx

customer_reviews.title: Broken Just after 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Hinge Broke around the 60 day mark Top button no longer works, 10 min timer no longer works lights just stay on, Top bulb no longer works. This thing is a total wast of money it's not built to last, best to skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Light gets everywhere with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light gets all around your item for total sanitize in one session, no having to flip item over because light can’t get under the bottom of your item! It doesn’t show in photos, but there is a clear plate that your item sits on and the lights from the bottom and top reflect every where.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a present, I think they really liked it and enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a much cheaper one that I bought off the shelf. This sanitizer is good quality. There are two bulbs on the top and two on bottom, full length, so you don't need to flip the item for another cycle. It is easy to turn on and unlike the cheaper products, you can see that the lights are actually lit when closed. I use it for my IPhone 8 but it can accommodate a larger phone. I also use it for my key fob/keys, glasses, credit cards. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item. I think by now it should be being sold cheaper, but it is comforting that the first dudes that came with this idea are the ones who are handling the first PhoneSoap idea and thus real killing of bacteria with this. Put your phone, 5 min, then turn if you have a cover and need to sanitize it removing the led, and done. Oh, and I have read some complains about the smell with what your phone comes off, it is not awful, it is not bad, it just smells sometimes like burned-ish, but it goes away and it is not nasty, clean actually.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Good but expected a bit more for the high price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it cleans both top and bottom and does it in half the time of the lower models. However, it is awkward to open - the magnet seal is perhaps a bit too strong and there's no lip/notch to aid in opening the lid. It could also use a better hinge so it can do a soft close. Lastly, it does not beep when sanitization is complete so I sometimes forget that my phone is in there. Overall it works but could use a bit more refinement for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Westley

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: worked well at first, then half of the UV lights in it stopped working and it stopped turning off unless you unplug the whole unit. Do not recommend. waste of my $.
customer_reviews.author: LabelguyLA

product_meta.title: PhoneSoap Pro UV Smartphone Sanitizer & Universal Charger | Patented & Clinically Proven UV Light Disinfector | (White)
feature_bullets: PHONE FIT GUARANTEE: Like our standard PhoneSoap models, PhoneSoap Pro fits the largest of smartphones, and is also guaranteed to fit the largest phone cases and accessories, like OtterBoxes.

TIME SAVER: PhoneSoap Pro kills germs in just 5 minutes - half the time as our standard phone sanitizers. Our 10 years of experience building world-class disinfection devices has led to a faster, more efficient design.

AUTOMATIC AND MANUAL MODES: Unlike our standard models, PhoneSoap Pro allows you to disinfect your phone automatically when placed inside, or at the touch of a button. Automatic or manual, the choice is yours.

AS SEEN ON SHARK TANK, DISCOVERY CHANNEL, GOOD MORNING AMERICA, AND QVC: PhoneSoap’s revolutionary bacteria-zapping technology was featured on ABC’s Shark Tank, tested and proven effective on the Discovery Channel, and sold to hundreds of thousands of happy customers on Good Morning America, The View, and QVC.

MORE EFFECTIVE THAN WIPES: Chemical wipes do a satisfactory job of killing bacteria in general, but they don’t perform as well at killing germs on phones. Uneven surfaces and applications leave germs alive while PhoneSoap gives you a consistent kill 100% of the time.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
